original:
Uses holy purification to summon light and
flames that eliminate everything.
translation:
Uses holy purification to summon light and
flames that eliminate everything.

original:
Unleashes a mysterious illusionary power
from its beloved staff. 
★Death
translation:
Unleashes a mysterious illusionary power
from its beloved staff. 
★Death

original:
Unleashes light energy from its holy shield,
Aegis.
translation:
Unleashes light energy from its holy shield,
Aegis.

original:
Gathers light within its sword, then swings 
it, creating a massive shockwave, slashing 
the opponent.
translation:
Gathers light within its sword, then swings 
it, creating a massive shockwave, slashing 
the opponent.

original:
Glares at the opponent with an evil eye,
sending them plummeting to hell. 
★Death
translation:
Glares at the opponent with an evil eye,
sending them plummeting to hell. 
★Death

original:
Launches the four kudagitsune from its
waist, fiercely slashing at the opponent.
translation:
Launches the four kudagitsune from its
waist, fiercely slashing at the opponent.

original:
Slashes at the opponent with the incredibly
sharp holy sword, Blutgang.
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with the incredibly
sharp holy sword, Blutgang.

original:
Unleashes a powerful shockwave, blowing all
opponents away with a single sweep of its
broom. ★Confusion
translation:
Unleashes a powerful shockwave, blowing all
opponents away with a single sweep of its
broom. ★Confusion

original:
Gathers energy from the earth, creating a
ball of flames which burns all in its path.
translation:
Gathers energy from the earth, creating a
ball of flames which burns all in its path.

original:
Unleashes powerful energy blasts from its
two cannons.
translation:
Unleashes powerful energy blasts from its
two cannons.

original:
Unleashes a powerful tornado of light from
its mouth, destroying all.
translation:
Unleashes a powerful tornado of light from
its mouth, destroying all.

original:
Eradicates the opponent with a powerful
beam of fused energy. 
★Death
translation:
Eradicates the opponent with a powerful
beam of fused energy. 
★Death

original:
Shoots balls of divine light that shine like an
aurora at the opponent.
translation:
Shoots balls of divine light that shine like an
aurora at the opponent.

original:
A graceful attack that rains roses upon the
opponent. 
★Stun ★Confusion
translation:
A graceful attack that rains roses upon the
opponent. 
★Stun ★Confusion

original:
Clads its entire body in blue flames and
charges at the opponent.
translation:
Clads its entire body in blue flames and
charges at the opponent.

original:
Slices the opponent in half with its ultimate
holy sword, Omega Blade.
translation:
Slices the opponent in half with its ultimate
holy sword, Omega Blade.

original:
A fearsome triple attack using its three
powerful arms.
★Paralysis
translation:
A fearsome triple attack using its three
powerful arms.
★Paralysis

original:
Smashes the opponent to dust using its
gunpowder-packed revolver-shaped hammer.
★Confusion
translation:
Smashes the opponent to dust using its
gunpowder-packed revolver-shaped hammer.
★Confusion

original:
Corrupts the opponent by shooting 
continuous rounds of darkness- infused data
destroying arrows. ★Paralysis
translation:
Corrupts the opponent by shooting 
continuous rounds of darkness- infused data
destroying arrows. ★Paralysis

original:
Scorches everything to ash by firing missiles
infused with energy gathered within its body.
translation:
Scorches everything to ash by firing missiles
infused with energy gathered within its body.

original:
Fires red hot burning flames infused with
purifying energy, scorching everything.
★Stun
translation:
Fires red hot burning flames infused with
purifying energy, scorching everything.
★Stun

original:
Scorches everything with an incredible raging
inferno.
translation:
Scorches everything with an incredible raging
inferno.

original:
Slams into the opponent at incredible
wind-piercing Speed while clad in powerful
armor.
translation:
Slams into the opponent at incredible
wind-piercing Speed while clad in powerful
armor.

original:
Implodes with holy energy, creating
devestating ruin. 
★Stun
translation:
Implodes with holy energy, creating
devestating ruin. 
★Stun

original:
Launches massive missiles resulting in huge
explosions. 
★Stun
translation:
Launches massive missiles resulting in huge
explosions. 
★Stun

original:
Bombards the opponent by unleashing
attacks from all the gunports all around its
body simultaniously.
translation:
Bombards the opponent by unleashing
attacks from all the gunports all around its
body simultaniously.

original:
Rains spikes down on its opponent by
launching them from its helmet.
translation:
Rains spikes down on its opponent by
launching them from its helmet.

original:
Fires an umbelievably powerful ball of
electricity, decimating all. 
★Paralysis
translation:
Fires an umbelievably powerful ball of
electricity, decimating all. 
★Paralysis

original:
Focuses all its strength into its powerful
scissors, becoming able to slice through the
dimension itself. ★Death
translation:
Focuses all its strength into its powerful
scissors, becoming able to slice through the
dimension itself. ★Death

original:
Unleashes an incredible amount of energy
from within its body, creating a massive
explosion.
translation:
Unleashes an incredible amount of energy
from within its body, creating a massive
explosion.

original:
Gathers a tremendous amount of electricity
into its horn, and then unleashes it in an
instant. ★Paralysis
translation:
Gathers a tremendous amount of electricity
into its horn, and then unleashes it in an
instant. ★Paralysis

original:
Fires powerful infrared rays from its chest,
reducing all to ash.
translation:
Fires powerful infrared rays from its chest,
reducing all to ash.

original:
Gathers light energy into the blades on both
arms and slashes the opponent to ribbons.
translation:
Gathers light energy into the blades on both
arms and slashes the opponent to ribbons.

original:
Fires powerful energy torpedoes that cause
massive explosions. 
★Stun
translation:
Fires powerful energy torpedoes that cause
massive explosions. 
★Stun

original:
Cleaves the opponent with its massive sword
'Ryuuzanmaru'. 
★Death
translation:
Cleaves the opponent with its massive sword
'Ryuuzanmaru'. 
★Death

original:
Swiftly slashes at the opponent with
massive, powerful claws.
translation:
Swiftly slashes at the opponent with
massive, powerful claws.

original:
Swings its powerful 'Battle Axe' around,
tossing it at the opponent with incredible
force. ★Confusion
translation:
Swings its powerful 'Battle Axe' around,
tossing it at the opponent with incredible
force. ★Confusion

original:
Embues its dagger with fierce manly energy,
then wildly slashes at the opponent. 
★Death
translation:
Embues its dagger with fierce manly energy,
then wildly slashes at the opponent. 
★Death

original:
Crushes the opponenent to dust using the
weapon 'Mjollnir' on its back.
translation:
Crushes the opponenent to dust using the
weapon 'Mjollnir' on its back.

original:
Slashes at the opponent with the tip of its
whip and sharp Rapier. 
★Paralysis
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with the tip of its
whip and sharp Rapier. 
★Paralysis

original:
Attacks with its tentacles used to manipulate
prey. 
★MP Drain ★Confusion
translation:
Attacks with its tentacles used to manipulate
prey. 
★MP Drain ★Confusion

original:
Passes judgement upon the opponent by
shooting electric arrows.
translation:
Passes judgement upon the opponent by
shooting electric arrows.

original:
Throws a powerful arrow of black lightning
engulfed in dark energy.
translation:
Throws a powerful arrow of black lightning
engulfed in dark energy.

original:
Shoots red-hot arrows at the opponent using
its holy bow 'Muspellsheimr'.
translation:
Shoots red-hot arrows at the opponent using
its holy bow 'Muspellsheimr'.

original:
Fires a massive beam of energy from the
canon on its snout.
translation:
Fires a massive beam of energy from the
canon on its snout.

original:
Unleashes a icy blast of air from its mouth,
freezing the opponent.
translation:
Unleashes a icy blast of air from its mouth,
freezing the opponent.

original:
Fires balls of dark energy from the canon on
its chest, destroying everything.
★Poison
translation:
Fires balls of dark energy from the canon on
its chest, destroying everything.
★Poison

original:
Slashes at the opponent with a sword that
freezes all it touches. 
★Sleep
translation:
Slashes at the opponent with a sword that
freezes all it touches. 
★Sleep

original:
Fiercely slashes at the opponent with ease
using its massive spear.
translation:
Fiercely slashes at the opponent with ease
using its massive spear.

original:
Scatters heart-shaped bubbles that steal
away the opponent's will to fight.
translation:
Scatters heart-shaped bubbles that steal
away the opponent's will to fight.
